MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 area of Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:31am. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a fault on our underground electricity network outside 3 Langtongate and due the extent of the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 6pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3pm on Saturday, 06 February 2021
